Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Necklace
Description: Necklace, 72 cm long, composed of disc-shaped beads made from fine white shell. The diametre of these beads varies from 8 to 10 mm and the thickness from 1 to 2 mm. Although the size of the beads varies greatly, the hole allowing for the beads to be strung together is, very nicely centred on each bead. This necklace must have been placed around the neck of the deceased.
